title: Requirements Gathering for ETLAutomationSuite
description: Gather comprehensive and detailed requirements from stakeholders and clients for the ETLAutomationSuite. The requirements should include the expected functionalities, performance expectations, data sources, data transformations, and any specific security or compliance considerations.

title: Design the ETLAutomationSuite Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the ETLAutomationSuite, including data extraction methods, transformation logic, and data loading procedures.

title: Decompose the ETLAutomationSuite Design into Tasks
description: Break down the high-level design into smaller, manageable tasks for implementation.

title: Implement the Extraction Module
description: Develop the module responsible for extracting data from various sources.
dependencies: Decompose the ETLAutomationSuite Design into Tasks

title: Implement the Transformation Module
description: Develop the module responsible for transforming data as per business requirements.

title: Implement the Loading Module
description: Develop the module responsible for loading data into the target database or storage solution.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design the database schema to store the transformed data.

title: Testing ETLAutomationSuite
description: Test the ETLAutomationSuite to ensure it meets the requirements, is scalable, and follows best practices. Verify that all dependencies (Implement the Extraction Module, Implement the Transformation Module, Implement the Loading Module) have been implemented and are functioning as expected.

title: Deploy ETLAutomationSuite
description: Deploy the ETLAutomationSuite to a staging environment for initial testing and validation.

title: Review ETLAutomationSuite Deployment
description: Review the deployment of the ETLAutomationSuite to ensure it was successful and addresses any issues raised during testing.
